Package CONTROLLER

Class C_FRAME

java.lang.Object
CONTROLLER.C_FRAME
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_C_FRAME
public class C_FRAME
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_C_FRAME
implementation of I_C_FRAME handles all programm functions not regarding special VIEWS.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createTabControllers()
    creates Controller for each tab method iterates through enum tabs and creates the specific Controller for each
    I_C_TAB getCurrentController()  
    static C_FRAME getInstance()
    this method checks if controller was already created if it wasn't it creates a new controller it always returns a reference to the controller
    void notifyAdjustFactors()
    this method should automatically update the values for the factors to meet the e2goal
    void notifyCalculate()
    notifies the effort controller to recalculate time
    void notifyClose()
    notifies the Controller that he should close the project and open the welcome window the controller therefore creates a "Do you really want to close and reject unsaved changes" windows if allowed, the controller opens V_Start again
    void notifyExit()
    notifies the Controller that the user wants to close the program window the controller therefore asks if the user really want to do it if prompt allowed - close program else - do nothing
    void notifyExportFactor()
    notifies the Controller that he should export the factors
    void notifyImportFactor()
    notifies the Controller that he should import new factors
    void notifyLast()
    when notified reload the project data for current view
    void notifyNext()
    when notified reload the project data for current view
    void notifyProductContentDELETE()
    notifies the controller that save Button in Functional Reqirement Tab is pressed
    void notifyProductContentNEW()
    notfies the controller that the new Button in Functional Reqirement Tab is pressed
    void notifySave()
    notifies the Controller that he should save the project the controller therefore tells the model to save the data
    void notifySelectedListChange​(java.lang.String selectedID)
    notify Controller that selected List Item has changed
    void notifySlider​(int sliderNo, int value)
    notifies the Controller, that a slider was changed
    void notifyTabChange​(int newTab)
    depending on the int newTab it switches to the specified Tab and runs the necessary functions in the view to show/hide buttons needed/not needed
    void notifyTabChangeEffort()
    should notify C_EFFORT that the tab in V_Effort_Tabs has changed
    void setLinks​(M_PROJECTDATA projData, I_C_START conStart, java.lang.String path)
    this method sets the necessary links after instantiation of the controller

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
